.. _extract_points_list:
``extract_points_list``
===========================

Extract list of giotto points objects

Description
-----------

to extract list of giotto points

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   extract_points_list(pointslist)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``pointslist``
     - list of inputs from which to create giotto points objects
